projectGridLines.title: Quantitative Research
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Research of arbitrage strategies using historical data.

Skill sets: Python, Panda, SQL, Machine Learning, Data Mining, C++, Mathematics

Traits expectation: Fluent communication skills

Expected learning: Student will learn about hedge funds research & commodity arbitrage industry.

Specific courses required for project execution: DSA, OOP, DBMS, Probability & statistics.
